name: Cruisin': For Something
description:
Wizard Jam 2016 Entry by Richard Walsh (brendonsmall on idle forums, @whilefun on twitter/twitch)

Version 1.3.2 is the recommended build, as it contains a few bug fixes and fun additions since the original jam entry.

For the Jam purists, the Wizard Jam "original" is capped at v1.2.3, as that is the last version that contains no new content (just bug fixes)
